title: Grayton Road and the Metroparks, Kamms Corners, 480, 71 all
posting_body: West Park single house one mile west of Rocky River Drive.
Close to Clara Westropp elementary school, Puritas Nursery, Grayton Road and the Metroparks, Kamms Corners, 480, 71 all within walking distance.
Freshly painted with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher/disposal, stacked washer/dryer.
Single car garage with remote garage door opener.
Verifiable and proof of income required.
